name: My Lovely Dog Adventure
description:
In My Lovely Dog Adventure you play as a little dog that discovers the world on its mission to find its friend.

Travel the world as a little Corgi! You wander mysterious and different landscapes in search of your beloved friend, collecting shiny chrystals on the way.
Find out what caused the petrification of the humans and find a way to undo the curse that befell them!

It's a short emotional story-driven exploration game that will keep you interested with an immersive story and stunning environments.

What to expect:
  • Exploration
  • An emotional story
  • Collecting chrystals
  • Beautiful landscapes
